title: The Wall Street Journal: White House suggests Democratic memo could be released if changes made
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”The White House signaled Sunday that a classified Democratic memo it blocked last week could see the light of day soon, after changes are made to address concerns raised by Justice Department officials.
The comments from a senior administration official came as Democrats said they were open to making changes to the document, which aims to rebut a Republican memo that alleges the Justice Department relied heavily on information paid for by Democrats to get a surveillance warrant on an onetime associate of President...
